abstracts.cdata!:
The Transmission Extension and
            Reinforcement Project will comprise: (a) installation of two
            single 500 kV circuit transmission lines, connecting Hab
            Power Complex (HPC) and Jamshoro; (b) installation of a
            third single-circuit 500 kV line between Guddu and Multan
            and a second single-circuit 500 kV line between Multan and
            Lahore via Gatti; (c) extension and reinforcement of
            existing 500 kV substations at Lahore, Gatti, Multan, Guddu
            with associated facilities including reactive compensation,
            telecommunications and control equipment; and (d) consulting
            services to assist and train the Water and Power Development
            Authority's (WAPDA) staff in the design, construction,
            operation and maintenance of the 500 kV network.
